chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Have you ever raised a pet_ Talk about your experience. 你養過寵物嗎_
chunks.chunk_text: 歡迎收聽口說英語通我是騎兵老師In this unit, we are going to talk about raising a pet在這個單元裡面,我們要來談談養寵物不知道你有沒有養寵物的經驗呢?趕快來聽一下今天的問題還有我們的回答

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Have you ever raised a pet_ Talk about your experience. 你養過寵物嗎_
chunks.chunk_text: QuestionHave you ever raised a pet?Talk about your experienceI had a dog almost 15 years ago and we called it PuppyPuppy was a miniature schnauzerPuppy came to my family when it was around 2 months old and very fond of usMy father used to go on a walk with Puppy

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Have you ever raised a pet_ Talk about your experience. 你養過寵物嗎_
chunks.chunk_text: He always felt very happy whenever my father took him for a walkI spent most of my time with my dog after coming back from schoolWhenever I returned home, he came to me and acted so fondlyIt seemed like he understood my moods and acted accordinglyI liked him a lot because he was good company

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Have you ever raised a pet_ Talk about your experience. 你養過寵物嗎_
chunks.chunk_text: 回答的時候呢,首先你應該講一講的是What kind of animal it is或是It was你養的是哪一種寵物啊?然後呢,你怎麼樣照顧它?最後呢,再說說你喜歡或是不喜歡的地方看一下我們的回答I had a dog almost 15 years ago我15年前曾經養過一隻狗這邊您聽到了我們說的是I had a dog

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Have you ever raised a pet_ Talk about your experience. 你養過寵物嗎_
chunks.chunk_text: 用過去式,所以之前我養過狗Almost 15 years ago幾乎是15年前的事了and we called it Puppy我們給狗狗起的名字呢就是Puppy,小狗那後面就介紹了Puppy was a miniature schnauzerMiniature schnauzer是它的品種的名稱它是迷你型的雪娜蕊或者是呢,也有人稱它叫老夫子狗因為它很可愛都是有個鬍子嘛

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Have you ever raised a pet_ Talk about your experience. 你養過寵物嗎_
chunks.chunk_text: Puppy came to my family when it was around 2 months oldPuppy來到我們家的時候呢,它大概才兩個月大When it was around 2 months old這個around放在數字前面就表示是大約的意思那麼,稅速呢,不管是人啦還有動物的表達都是一樣的就是數字呢,後面加上你的時間比如說像是years old那就表示多少歲數

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Have you ever raised a pet_ Talk about your experience. 你養過寵物嗎_
chunks.chunk_text: 那是兩個禮拜大,你就說2 weeks old後面說and very fond of us它好喜歡我們哦這邊有個片語叫做be fond of就是喜歡的意思My father used to go on a walk with Puppy我爸爸以前呢,總是跟它去散步這邊有個片語go on a walk其實就是walk的意思哦我爸爸呢,常常帶它去散步

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通Have you ever raised a pet_ Talk about your experience. 你養過寵物嗎_
chunks.chunk_text: He always felt very happywhenever my father took him for a walk當我爸爸每次帶它去散步的時候它都非常的開心這邊要特別注意我們運用了一個連接詞叫做wheneverwhenever就是無論何時的意思你可以看得出來它是when這個連接詞後面加上ever那麼加了ever它的語氣也比較強就是無論何時就是每一次
